document_data.name: The Traveler's Rest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Traveler's Rest''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Scornubel]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Though quite large, the inn was an older establishment and showing signs of its age as of {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Activities: The accommodations within the Traveler's Rest were good and the prices were cheap.
